item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, October 3, 2024 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Canvas is a new way to write and code with ChatGPT (430 points | 280 comments)
2. Were RNNs all we needed? (151 points | 64 comments)
3. The Heart of Unix (2018) (26 points | 3 comments)
4. Dance training superior to physical exercise in inducing brain plasticity (2018) (170 points | 93 comments)
5. Serving 70B-scale LLMs efficiently on low-resource edge devices [pdf] (166 points | 48 comments)
6. Mux (YC W16) is hiring a video engineer ( | hide)
7. Google Says It Won't Follow Amazon's Lead with a Return-to-Office Mandate (94 points | 61 comments)
8. A Statement from Automattic (8 points | 2 comments)
9. Image Editing with Gaussian Splatting (197 points | 51 comments)
10. Improving Accessibility Using Vision Models (18 points | 9 comments)
11. What Kind of Writer Is ChatGPT? (43 points | 27 comments)
12. MikroPhone: A privacy enhanced, simple and featured RISC-V mobile phone (47 points | 2 comments)
13. Solving methane mysteries with satellite imagery (99 points | 19 comments)
14. Tracking (C++) Shared Pointer Leaks (11 points | 1 comment)
15. Patent troll Sable pays up, dedicates all its patents to the public (611 points | 189 comments)
16. HTTrack Website Copier (14 points | 2 comments)
17. Why Gumroad Didn't Choose Htmx (166 points | 82 comments)
18. US Dept of Energy announces $1.5B in electric grid improvements (28 points | 5 comments)
19. Discussing the Neptunian desert, savanna, and ridge (12 points | discuss)
20. FLUX1.1 [pro] – New SotA text-to-image model from Black Forest Labs (136 points | 93 comments)
21. Biggest solar flare since 2017 erupts from sun and Earth is in the firing line (11 points | discuss)
22. Starlink offering free internet access for 30 days for Hurricane Helene victims (186 points | 139 comments)
23. UK will give sovereignty of Chagos Islands to Mauritius (86 points | 85 comments)
24. I Solve Problems (talk at EuroBSDCon 2024) (31 points | 2 comments)
25. A haze of inspiration (3 points | discuss)
26. Earth's ambipolar electrostatic field and its role in ion escape to space (13 points | 1 comment)
27. Identification of officer from Sir John franklin's Northwest Passage expedition (13 points | 3 comments)
28. The forgotten story of Britain’s perilous bid to fly around the world (15 points | 3 comments)
29. Determinism in League of Legends: Implementation (2017) (80 points | 36 comments)
30. Modifications to GPU Hardware to Benefit Signed Distance Fields (51 points | 11 comments)
